code: export var addpost=function addpost(newPost){return{type:'ADDPOST',newp:newPost};};export var addcomment=function addcomment(index,newComment,updpost){return{type:'ADDCOMMENT',newc:newComment,indx:index,up:updpost};};export var addlike=function addlike(index,updpost){return{type:'ADDLIKE',indx:index,up:updpost};};export var editpost=function editpost(index,newtext,updpost){return{type:'EDITPOST',indx:index,up:updpost,nt:newtext};};export var deletepost=function deletepost(index,updpost){return{type:'DELETEPOST',indx:index,up:updpost};};
